statements: SELECT * FROM compliance_monitoring
SELECT vendor_name, certifications FROM compliance_monitoring WHERE regulatory_requirements = TRUE
SELECT vendor_name, certifications FROM compliance_monitoring WHERE adherence_to_standards = FALSE
SELECT vendor_name, adherence_to_standards FROM compliance_monitoring ORDER BY vendor_name ASC
SELECT vendor_name, regulatory_requirements, adherence_to_standards FROM compliance_monitoring WHERE certifications IS NOT NULL
SELECT vendor_name, certifications FROM compliance_monitoring WHERE regulatory_requirements = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM compliance_monitoring WHERE vendor_id BETWEEN 1 AND 5 ORDER BY vendor_name DESC;
SELECT vendor_id, vendor_name FROM compliance_monitoring WHERE adherence_to_standards = FALSE AND certifications IS NOT NULL;
SELECT certifications FROM compliance_monitoring WHERE vendor_name LIKE 'A%' OR vendor_name LIKE 'B%';
SELECT vendor_id, vendor_name, regulatory_requirements FROM compliance_monitoring WHERE vendor_id IN (3, 7, 9, 12) ORDER BY vendor_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM vendor_compliance
SELECT vendor_name, certification_status FROM vendor_compliance WHERE regulatory_compliance='ISO 9001'
SELECT * FROM vendor_compliance WHERE vendor_id=1
SELECT vendor_name, regulatory_compliance FROM vendor_compliance ORDER BY vendor_name DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_requirements FROM regulatory_requirements
SELECT * FROM vendor_compliance WHERE vendor_id > 100 ORDER BY vendor_name DESC
SELECT vendor_name, certification_status FROM vendor_compliance WHERE regulatory_compliance='ISO 9001'
SELECT DISTINCT certification_status FROM vendor_compliance
SELECT * FROM regulatory_requirements WHERE deadline > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY requirement_name
SELECT vendor_name, regulatory_compliance FROM vendor_compliance WHERE vendor_id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT * FROM VendorCompliance;
SELECT vendor_id, certification_status FROM VendorCompliance WHERE vendor_id = 5;
SELECT regulatory_requirements, compliance_date FROM VendorCompliance ORDER BY compliance_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM RegulatoryRequirements WHERE regulation_category = 'Healthcare';
SELECT certification_name, certification_agency FROM Certifications WHERE validity_period > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM VendorCompliance WHERE compliance_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT vendor_id, regulatory_requirements FROM VendorCompliance WHERE certification_status = 'Valid' ORDER BY vendor_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM RegulatoryRequirements WHERE regulation_category = 'Data Privacy';
SELECT certification_name, certification_agency, validity_period FROM Certifications WHERE validity_period < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM VendorCompliance WHERE regulatory_requirements LIKE '%Security%' ORDER BY vendor_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Vendor;
SELECT name, location FROM Vendor ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT id, certification FROM Vendor WHERE id = 3;
SELECT standard_name, status FROM Compliance WHERE status = 'Pending';
SELECT requirement_name, description FROM RegulatoryRequirements WHERE category = 'Security' ORDER BY requirement_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Vendor;
SELECT name, location FROM Vendor WHERE certification='ISO 9001';
SELECT * FROM Compliance WHERE date_checked BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT v.name, r.requirement_name FROM Vendor v JOIN VendorCompliance vc ON v.id = vc.vendor_id JOIN RegulatoryRequirements r ON vc.requirement_id = r.id WHERE vc.compliance_status='Approved';
SELECT c.standard_name, v.name FROM Compliance c JOIN Vendor v ON c.vendor_id = v.id WHERE c.status='Pending' ORDER BY c.date_checked DESC;
SELECT * FROM Vendor;
SELECT vendor_name, vendor_location FROM Vendor ORDER BY vendor_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Requirements WHERE req_name LIKE '%security%';
SELECT vendor_name, status_name, req_name FROM VendorCompliance INNER JOIN ComplianceStatus ON VendorCompliance.status_id = ComplianceStatus.status_id;
SELECT cert_name, cert_validity_date FROM Certifications WHERE cert_validity_date >= '2023-01-01';
SELECT vendor_name, vendor_location FROM Vendor;
SELECT * FROM ComplianceStatus WHERE status_name='Active';
SELECT req_name, req_description FROM Requirements ORDER BY req_name DESC;

SELECT Certifications.cert_name, Vendor.vendor_name, Requirements.req_name FROM Certifications JOIN VendorCompliance ON Certifications.cert_id = VendorCompliance.vendor_id JOIN Requirements ON VendorCompliance.req_id = Requirements.req_id;
SELECT * FROM VendorCompliance WHERE status_id IN (SELECT status_id FROM ComplianceStatus WHERE status_name='Inactive');
